description:
With light cushion and extra coverage, these socks are sure to inspire your next adventure. The minimalist design and mesh zones keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails.

  • Made from a soft blend of merino wool, nylon, and elastane
  • 4-Degree™ elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool™ Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Alpine Trail Print Crew Socks - Unisex
